notes: mass noun; plural ori used for jewelry
example_sentence_english: I am looking for pure gold.

example_sentence_italian: Ha vinto un oro alle Olimpiadi.
example_sentence_english: He won a gold at the Olympics.
Gold has gone up in price.
The golds shine in the shop window.
The price of gold is rising.
We pay attention to the golds.
A warm reflection comes from the gold.

example_sentence_italian: Il valore deriva dagli ori antichi.
example_sentence_english: The value comes from ancient golds.
The statuette is cast in gold.
There are impurities in the golds.
I read a book about gold.

example_sentence_italian: Il museo prepara una mostra sugli ori etruschi.
example_sentence_english: The museum is preparing an exhibition about Etruscan golds.
He works with gold every day.

notes: contraction of con + gli; less common
example_sentence_italian: Il restauro si fa cogli ori originali.
example_sentence_english: The restoration is done with the original golds.
